title: Why Pixel XL baseband is unknown
content: purchased a used unlocked Pixel XL from local flea market. Put in my SIm and verified functionality ( connected to my carrier/WiFi Working)and was happy and  so purchased it and phone was turned OFF for next one week. on next  day I noticed that the phone WON'T connect to my carrier.  in the settings IMEI is blank and baseband is  showing as UNKNOWN.  phone dialer app keep crashing  so I can't verify IMEI. How can phone have this issue while being SWITCHED OFF. phone is NOT ROOTED and running OFICIAL android 9.0 Any way I can get this to WORKING STATE other than WARRANTY (which I Don't have) Any Help?
